#### Load packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

#### Read in data
```{r}
# read in data
stations <- read.fwf("data/RAWS.txt", widths = c(28, 14, 8, 10, 10), 
         col.names = c("station", "state", "elevation", "latitude", "longitude"), skip = 3, colClasses = c("character", "character", "integer", "integer", "integer"), stringsAsFactors = FALSE, nrow = 493)

stations <- stations %>%
  separate(latitude, into = c('lat_dd', 'lat_mm', 'lat_ss'), sep = c(2, 4)) %>%
  mutate(ns = rep('W', nrow(stations))) %>%
  

stations$ as.integer(c(stations$lat_dd) 



stations <- stations %>% mutate(latitude =  biogeo::dms2dd(lat_dd, lat_mm, lat_ss, ns))
  
                          
```

### Convert coordinates into decimal degrees
```{r}
biodms2dd()

```
